comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: British aviator Archibald B. Ford, age 22, wounded twice, toured the US giving lectures in 1915. He was also acting as an advisor on the construction of war planes. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F50A1EFC345C13738...

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Looks like they took him up to a rooftop for his photo.
